snippet: The fine was the largest ever issued by the legislative panel, whose scathing report had outlined former Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez’s history of sexual harassment of female staff members.
abstract: New York State legislative ethics panel imposes $330,000 fine on Vito J Lopez, Brooklyn Democrat who resigned from Assembly after accusations of sexual harassment of female staff members; fine, resulting from at least 33 episodes in which Lopez violated state's Public Officers Law,  is largest ever issued by panel.
lead_paragraph: The fine was the largest ever issued by the legislative panel, whose scathing report had outlined former Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez’s history of sexual harassment of female staff members.

headline.seo: Vito Lopez Fined $330,000 in Sexual Abuse Case
headline.main: Ethics Panel Fines Lopez $330,000 in Harassment Case
headline.print_headline: Lopez Fined $330,000 by Panel Over Harassment of Women
